CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound brass
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Compounding brass chills the soul. Fingers go numb, breath fogs in warm air, and the body trembles â€” all to trap heat within metal. Endure the cold long enough, and the Allomancer can unleash a blazing storm from a single spark.
